response.overview: In this second volume of classic moments from "The Gabby Hayes Show," everybody's favorite story wrangler rounds up a herd of Western tales guaranteed to please all ages. Over the course of four episodes, Bob Steele goes undercover to bag a cattle thief; Lash La Rue takes on a gang of stagecoach robbers; Eddie Dean works to avenge a group of murdered soldiers; and Buster Crabbe sweats out a bum murder rap.
response.title: The Gabby Hayes Show: Vol. 2
